roleset.name: agree (to), agreed upon by both parties
roleset.note: CONSENT-V NOTES: Frames file for 'consent' based on sentences in wsj. No Verbnet entry, Framenet class Commitment. (from consent.01-v predicate notes)
CONSENSUAL-J NOTES: Added by Julia based on BOLT-1, consent-v.01. Corresponds to VNcls settle-89. (from consensual.01-j)

example.name: typical usage
example.text: While neither admitting nor denying wrongdoing, Triton and Mr. Chase consented to findings of violations in connection with limited-partnership sales.
example.arg: While neither admitting nor denying wrongdoing
to findings of violations in connection with limited-partnership sales

example.name: infinitive arg1
example.text: Two of Mr. Holmes's business associates who worked for Venture Capitalists, Kimberly Ann Smith and Frederick Byrum, also consented to being enjoined from violations of registration provisions of the securities laws.
example.arg: Two of Mr. Holmes's business associates who worked for Venture Capitalists, Kimberly Ann Smith and Frederick Byrum,
to being enjoined from violations of registration provisions of the securities laws

example.name: arg1
example.text: Note that in both cases the sex was consensual , obviously not legally , but in the sense that there was n't any physical compulsion .
example.arg: obviously not legally, but in the sense that there wasn't any physical compulsion

example.name: both args
example.text: Mr. Hicks vehemently asserts that all conduct that occurred during the evening of the incident was consensual by everyone involved
example.arg: all conduct that occurred during the evening of the incident

example.name: arg1
example.text: Pupils equal , round , regular , reactive to light , direct and consensual .
